mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_club join tb_board using(board_no) where board_delete = 'N'

select club_name, board_no, club_intro, club_plan, club_place, club_etc, max_people, end_yn, file_name, nickname, count(j.user_id) club_people from tb_club c join tb_board b using(board_no) join tb_user u using(user_id) left join tb_file f using(board_no) join tb_club_join j using(club_name) where board_delete = 'N' group by club_name, board_no, club_intro, club_plan, club_place, club_etc, max_people, end_yn, file_name, nickname order by board_no desc

select club_name, board_no, club_intro, club_plan, club_place, club_etc, max_people, end_yn, file_name , nickname, count(j.user_id) club_people from tb_club c join tb_board b using(board_no) join tb_user u using(user_id) left join tb_file f using(board_no) join tb_club_join j using(club_name) where board_delete = 'N' and club_name = '수정 끝' group by club_name, board_no, club_intro, club_plan, club_place, club_etc, max_people, end_yn, file_name, nickname
mapper.insert: insert into tb_board values(SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, '동호회', '동호회', sysdate, #{writer}, default, default)
insert into tb_club values(#{clubName}, SEQ_BOARD.CURRVAL, #{clubIntro}, #{clubPlan}, #{clubPlace}, #{clubEtc}, #{maxPeople}, default)
insert into tb_file values(SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BOARD.CURRVAL, #{renameFileName}, NULL, NULL)
insert into tb_comment values(SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo},default, #{rUserId}, #{rContent}, sysdate, 'N', default )
mapper.select: select REPLY_NO, BOARD_NO, USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE, DECYN, COMMENTS_DELETE, USER_FILE, NICKNAME from tb_comment join tb_user using(user_ID) where comments_delete = 'N' and board_no = #{boardNo} order by REPLY_NO DESC
